message: You absolutely did. Something about my armor.
I was literally just breathing! I didn't—
I [jitter]heard[/jitter] you, Replacement. This helmet doesn't muffle [slow factor=0.5]everything[/slow].
Okay but what if it does? What if that's [nod]exactly[/nod] what it does?
Just saying, you've been wearing it in desert heat for like three hours—
